function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Shift in political focus from short-term gains to long-term resilience measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on cars for transportation due to reduced demand for public transport, leading to higher levels of air pollution and increased risk of accidents.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift towards working from home and changes in travel patterns leading to long-term reduction in demand for public transport.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connection between human activity, biodiversity loss, environmental degradation, and health highlighted by the pandemic, leading to increased awareness and urgency for environmental action.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in social practices including in mobility and work practices may lead to persistent shifts in transportation behaviors.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced high carbon travel has contributed to covid-19 related emissions reductions, but the persistence of reduced travel demand is uncertain.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changing social and political practices affecting sustainable transitions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased decentralization of energy governance from multilateral to national, transnational, and local scales due to the frailty of global cooperation and the impact of covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient policies and regulatory frameworks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backtracking of major players on national level commitments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated and inclusive global energy governance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in green stimulus policies across countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exacerbated trends towards ’re-shoring’ and localization of energy systems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short-term focus on health and livelihoods without considering long-term health and environmental impacts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on fossil fuels despite evidence of superior economic returns from sustainable initiatives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate support for cleantech market progress and green energy risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High oil and gas prices and volatility resulting from cuts in investment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in fids in lng risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential peak fossil fuel demand and demise of fossil fuels accelerated by covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on global supply chains for healthcare products and appliances","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of
